# `PaymentResponse` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| originatingMessageId | `string` | No | Reference to the ID of the original payment request message this response is for. |
| paymentStatus | `string` | No | The status of the payment transaction. |
| failureReason | `string` | No | The reason the payment request failed. |
